node.text:
Barolo is The King of Wines and The Wine for Kings. In this video we take a closer look at the mapping of the different communes inside this fantastic region. 

And, we also talk about why mapping makes an area even more interesting for you as an investor in wine.

#rarewinedk #winefacts #barolo #barolowine #italianwine #barololovers #barolowines #italianwines #italianwinelover #italianwinelovers #italianwinery #italianredwine #italianredwinelover

node.title: A Talk About The King Of Wine: Barolo🇮🇹

node.text:
Let’s make it Cristal clear: This is a fantastic Champagne! Cristal is the  top wine from Louis Roederer that is combined of the best grapes, mainly from Grand Cru terroir in Champagne. 

After eight long years in the cellar it is released and will keep developing ofr decades to come. Hear the story of why the bottle is clear, flat bottomed and packed in noisy yellow paper in this video🍾

node.title: Let’s Make It Cristal Clear In Just 8 Minutes🍾

node.text:
White Burgundy is getting a lot of attention these years, both from wine lovers and wine investors🚀 In this video, we talk about the difference between Chablis, Meursault, Chassagne, and Puligny-Montrachet.

Chardonnay is the main grape, but don’t close your eyes to the quality of Aligoté!

node.text:
Romanée-Conti is not only the name of the most famous vineyard in the world but also the name of perhaps the best wine producer of all time🙌🏻

In the village of Vosne-Romanée, in the heart of Burgundy, we find the legendary Domaine de la Romanée-Conti, named after the vineyard, itself. And in this video, you can join us for the story of one of the most legendary producers in Burgundy and the world.

#drc #winevideo #domainedelaromaneeconti #romaneeconti #montrachet #latache #grandcru #burgundy #winesoffrance #winetalk #wineknowledge #winefacts #winestory #winehistory #winefact #winenerding #winegeeks #winenerds #burgundywines #winevideos #burgundyfrance #wineburgundy #winesommelier #wineofburgundy #rarewinedk #winespecialist #wineadvocate #topwine #fineandrarewines #rarewine

node.title: Learn About Domaine De La Romanée-Conti In 10 Minutes🍷

#jasonhass #winetalk #winevideo #tablascreek #tablascreekvineyard #winemaker #vineyard #tablascreekwinery #rarewinedk #wine #vineyardlife #winetalks

node.text:
Domaine Coche-Dury is one of the absolute best and most prestigious white wine producers🙌🏻

Domaine Coche-Dury was founded in the 1920s by Léon Coche, but was first named Coche-Dury when Jean-Francois Coche got the surname Dury through marriage in the 1970s. Despite a 100-year history, it was not until the 1970s, under Jean-Francois, that the foundation of the Coche-Dury we know today was built.

node.text:
Two men meet on a vacation and decide to change the world of wine as we know it🍷 A partnership across the Atlantic, for the very first time. 

The first vintage was 1979 and until now we have seen one success after the other. Hear the story of two great men and three great wines.abernet Sauvignon from Napa Valley. Opus One became the name of the venture and is now one of the reference-point wines for the area and the grape. 

The first vintage was 1979 and until now we have seen one success after the other. Hear the story of two great men and three great wines in this video!

#opusonewinery #opusone #winetalk #mondaviwinery #mondavi #napavalley #napawine #americanwine #wine #winemoments #winelife #napavalley #mouton #moutonrothschild #bordeaux #frenchwine #bordeauxwine #winelovers #rarewinedk #napavalleywinery #winemaker #vineyard #wineislife #winemakers #winewinewine #vines #grapes #bordeauxwines

node.text:
Dominio de Pingus is the world famous winery in Ribera del Duero in Spain🇪🇸 Started from scratch by the Danish winemaker Peter ‘Pingus’ Sisseck, who learnt how to make wine in Bordeaux. 

Peter came to Spain in the early 1990’s and his ambitions led him to start Pingus with the now famous 1995 vintage. Now 25 years down the road, the wine and the man is ever evolving and keeps getting praise from all sides. We salute our fellow countryman Peter Sisseck and talk about a few of the changes that has happened here over the years🍷

node.text:

node.text:
We recently opened a 3 liters bottle of 2001 Château Haut-Brion🍷

It’s still not fully developed and have a long life ahead. Still taking everything into consideration, this was a fantastic glass of wine. Intensity and that typical Haut-Brion finesse that you never forget, when you have tried it!

#chateauhautbrion #hautbrion #bordeauxwines #tastingwine #rarewinedk #winetastings #wineworld #sommelierlife #sommelierlifestyle #bordeauxwine #winemoments #winereels #winevideos #wineadvocate #robertparker #instawinelovers #winstagram #sommelier #tastingwine #winetastings #wineknowledge #winetimes #redwinetime

node.text:
Barolo is The King of Wines and The Wine for Kings. In this video we take a closer look at the mapping of the different communes inside this fantastic region. 

And, we also talk about why mapping makes an area even more interesting for you as an investor in wine.

#rarewinedk #winefacts #barolo #barolowine #italianwine #barololovers #barolowines #italianwines #italianwinelover #italianwinelovers #italianwinery #italianredwine #italianredwinelover
